author: Dr Ben Miles
description:
Scientists transplanted gut microbiota from humans and primates into germ-free mice, revealing that microbes can influence brain gene expression related to energy use and neural development. This discovery highlights a metabolic link between gut bacteria and brain evolution, with implications for understanding neurodevelopmental disorders.

Source Article: https://phys.org/news/2026-01-microbes-key-brain-evolution.html
